Text.Name: sys_getnothing
Text.Desc: We failed to obtain anything useful.

Text.Name: sys_noreaction
Text.Desc: There seems to be no response whatsoever.

Text.Name: sys_brokenneck
Text.Desc: [NAME] had a sudden epiphany, and seemed to have found a way to make that prolonged breakthrough on [ITS] cultivation Law. [IT] sat down in a hurry and quickly entered a state of meditation.

Text.Name: sys_openplacelink
Text.Desc: Having arrived [PLACE] for the first time, [NAME] asked the locals about the place.

Text.Name: sys_openplace
Text.Desc: Having been to [PLACE] several times, [NAME] became familiar with this place and found a new interesting destination nearby.

Text.Name: sys_test
Text.Desc: [NAME] had a sudden epiphany, and seemed to have found a way to make that prolonged breakthrough on [ITS] cultivation Law. [IT] sat down in a hurry and quickly entered a state of meditation.

Text.Name: Story_SoulSeach
Text.Desc: [NAME] performed Soul Inquiry on the dying cultivator, trying to salvage some useful information.

Text.Name: Story_JiangDao
Text.Desc: [NAME] was immersed in the profundity of Tao.

Text.Name: Story_TitleGold
Text.Desc: Having achieved the cultivational state of golden core, [NAME] was given a title by fellow cultivators.

Text.Name: Story_TitleRandom
Text.Desc: Having been going outside of [ITS] sect for adventure, [NAME] enjoys a growing reputation among fellow cultivators.

Text.Name: Story_sys_BossLong_Wish
Text.Desc: The mysterious being within the cavern seems to possess some miraculous powers, and one can ask a special favour of it in exchange of some offerings. However, rage will ensue if one fails to present the offerings it demands.

Text.Name: Story_sys_BossLong_WishSuccess
Text.Desc: The mysterious cavern was pleased with the offerings and thus fulfilled [NAME]'s wish.

Text.Name: System_RobGreateBuilding
Text.Desc: [NAME] tried to capture the wonder's essence.

Text.Name: System_LearnGreateBuilding
Text.Desc: It is said that there is a secret to a mysterious formation within this wonder, and [NAME] tries to meditate on it.

Text.Name: System_LearnGreateBuilding_WuDang
Text.Desc: The Golden Hall of Wudang exudes a serene and arcane air of divinity, seemingly conveying a message to its followers.

Text.Name: System_FightMap_ZhenWuShenXiang
Text.Desc: Worship the Perfected Warrior Statue for a little Divinity guidance.

Text.Name: System_EnterQianKunJie
Text.Desc: A magical building with the Taiyi Sect's secret treasure, Universe Spirit Crystal, as its core. The inside has its own rule for physical space and can be used to store all kinds of items. But there is a strange seal that keeps away people's mind. No matter how strong you are, no one can forcibly see its inside. Seems like there is a hidden secret.

Text.Name: System_EnterQianKunJie1
Text.Desc: [NAME] simply checked the entrance. The other side of the seal seems to be a space without any moving creatures or signs of danger.

Text.Name: System_FightMap_NormalTalk
Text.Desc: The life of a commoner is dull but fun.

Text.Name: System_FightMap_DiscipleTalk
Text.Desc: On the Law toward immortality, one must move ever forward...

Text.Name: System_Tribute
Text.Desc: [NAME] arrived at [PLACE], and prepared to receive the annual tribute.

Text.Name: System_FightMap_UnlockPlant
Text.Desc: [NAME] attempted to collect a sample from the object.

Text.Name: System_FightMap_UnlockBuilding
Text.Desc: [NAME] tried to learn how this building was constructed.

Text.Name: Story_SuperPartItem
Text.Desc: Try to comprehend the profound knowledge of Body Remolding embodied in this body part.

Text.Name: Story_Fight
Text.Desc: Ask disciples to have a friendly competition here.
